input_full.title: Overhaul /update-and-archive into /end-epoch -- drop manual doc review
input_full.body:
The manual documentation update and review step in `/update-and-archive` was valuable during bootstrapping when processes were still forming. Now that the system is mature, this step adds friction without proportional value.

**Proposed direction:** Replace `/update-and-archive` with `/end-epoch` that focuses on closing the epoch cleanly (porcelain, archive upload, state transitions) without requiring manual doc review passes.

**Needs deep dive into:**
- What the current doc review actually catches vs. misses
- Which parts of update-and-archive are still load-bearing
- What "end epoch" should minimally guarantee
- Impact on self-improve cycles that consume epoch data

---
Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
